Document the observations in the Maternity Case Record (use the chart for women in whom labour is doubtful). 
Clinical notes (such as main complaint) need to be made on the pages in the MCR for women who are not in labour.  
General care of women in labour 
Respect, privacy and companionship 
• Treat all women in labour with respect and courtesy.
